Bhokkhi，at VbhA．424，in phrase sucikāmo bh．brāhmaṇo is a kind of Desider，formation fr．bhuj° （bhuñj），appearing as *bhukṣ=bhokkh （cp．bhokkhaṁ），with ending °in; meaning “wishing to eat．＂ It corresponds to Sk．bhoktu-kāma．Cp．also n．ag．bhoktṛ of *bhukṣ，enjoyer，eater．P．bhokkhi might be Sk．bhoktrī，if it was not for the latter being f．The word is a curiosity．（Page 509）
